tha-ap295:0.3_0: held together by those senior monks, who song,

tha-ap295:3.1_0: I raise my joined palms to one side,
tha-ap295:3.2_0: I paid homage at her and bowed,
tha-ap295:3.4_0: I cooked it on what I did.

tha-ap295:6.1_0: Attaining the four kinds of textual analysis
tha-ap295:7.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Kaṇṭaka.
